abstract: German High Command says attacks on Brit east coast shipping revealed Brit vulnerability
snippet: LONDON, Feb. 1 (UP)--The Air Ministry warned tonight of the possibility of a "desperate onslaught" against the British Isles by a fleet of new long-range bombers, capable of a speed of 315 miles an hour, which the Germans are said to be constructi...

headline.main: BRITAIN IS WARNED OF MASS AIR RAIDS; Air Ministry Reports Reich Is Building Speedy Bombers to Fly at Great Heights

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Feb. 1 (UP)--The Air Ministry warned tonight of the possibility of a "desperate onslaught" against the British Isles by a fleet of new long-range bombers, capable of a speed of 315 miles an hour, which the Germans are said to be constructing.
